attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I admire Trump Oppar but instead it asked me if I liked a picture of a Cheeto. Boy, that was one messed up Cheeto. Any way I kept looking, hoping to find my senpai but than it asked for where I lived. So I thought if I put my address, Senpai Trump Oppar would show up at my house and give me a signed autograph of his underwear. But instead... in my mailbox... WAS A CHEETO! Ok well it wasnâ€™t a real Cheeto, it was in a picture. BUT IT WAS JUST AS UNPLEASANT AS THE LIVE ACTION FILM. I am scarred for life ğŸ˜­
